name: Play Verse Monument: Stacking Tower
description:
This is Play-Verse. This is a monument to remind us the memory of how simple and yet important play is. The shape of the monument is taken from the Stacking Tower Toy. 

MP4 Video Loop, 3840 x 2160 pixel (4K UHDTV) resolution
Illustration by Azizi Al Majid, Rendered by Ranantha

All Rights Reserved
